thread.title: Washington, DC, workers to get 16 weeks paid leave under city hall plan that taxes businesses
thread.title_full: Washington, DC, workers to get 16 weeks paid leave under city hall plan that taxes businesses - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Washington, DC, workers to get 16 weeks paid leave under city hall plan that taxes businesses
text: Washington, D.C., is poised to give workers in the city the most generous family-leave benefits in the country -- a plan that is backed by the Obama administration and would side-step Congress on such issues. ...
